title: Wanted: T206 Waddell Portrait SGC 20 or 30
author: paulmolive

posts.post_title: Wanted: T206 Waddell Portrait SGC 20 or 30
posts.post_content: Looking for a lower grade Rube Waddell T206 portrait.  SGC 20 30 (maybe 40)  Working on a small collection of greatest lefties.  All my other cards are SGC graded so trying to keep it uniform for a display.  Would also be interested in a Waddell E93 Standard Caramel (SGC 20-30)  Been looking on eBay lately with no luck.  Anyone looking to sell?  Thanks
